Returns: true if dividers are allowed below this item
isDividerAllowedBelow().Description: Dividers are only drawn between items if both items allow it, or above the first and below the last item if that item allows it.

Returns: true if dividers are allowed above this item
isDividerAllowedAbove().Description: Dividers are only drawn between items if both items allow it, or above the first and below the last item if that item allows it.

Parameters: boolean: false to prevent dividers being drawn above this item
setDividerAllowedAbove(boolean).Description: Dividers are only drawn between items if both items allow it, or above the first and below the last item if that item allows it. By default, @B_android#support#v7#preference#Preference#onBindViewHolder_E@ will set this to the same value as returned by @B_android#support#v7#preference#Preference#isSelectable_E@, so that non-selectable items do not have a divider drawn above them.

Returns: The view, or null if no view with the requested ID is found.
Parameters: int: Resource ID of the view to find
findViewById(int).Description: Returns a cached reference to a subview managed by this object. If the view reference is not yet cached, it falls back to calling @B_android#view#View#findViewById_E@ and caches the result.

Parameters: boolean: false to prevent dividers being drawn below this item
setDividerAllowedBelow(boolean).Description: Dividers are only drawn between items if both items allow it, or above the first and below the last item if that item allows it. By default, @B_android#support#v7#preference#Preference#onBindViewHolder_E@ will set this to the same value as returned by @B_android#support#v7#preference#Preference#isSelectable_E@, so that non-selectable items do not have a divider drawn below them.

ClassDesc: A @B_android#support#v7#widget#RecyclerView#ViewHolder_E@ class which caches views associated with the default @B_android#support#v7#preference#Preference_E@ layouts. Cached views can be retrieved by calling @B_android#support#v7#preference#PreferenceViewHolder#findViewById_E@.
